title: Create registry schema and migration
description: Create registry.json schema and migrate existing projects.json + shared-project-mcps.json + repo-claude-v2.zsh configs into unified registry format. This enables per-project MCP configurations.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Migration imports configs from repo-claude-v2.zsh (REPO_CONFIGS_V2, SUPABASE_TOKENS, LINEAR_TOKENS)
Migration preserves all existing project data from projects.json
Migration imports global MCPs from shared-project-mcps.json
Registry includes version field for future migrations
